name: EQUATION_TEMPLATES
sql:
CREATE TABLE "EQUATION_TEMPLATES" (
	"ID"	INTEGER NOT NULL UNIQUE,
	"DISPLAY_NAME"	TEXT(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT "Linear",
	"EQN_DISPLAY_TEMPLATE"	TEXT(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT "y = (%.2f * x) + %.2f",
	"EQN_Y_EQUALS"	TEXT(128) NOT NULL DEFAULT "(m * x) + b",
	"N_PTS_BIAS_MULTIPLIER"	NUMERIC NOT NULL DEFAULT 1.0,
	PRIMARY KEY("ID")
)

name: EQUATION_TEMPLATE_PARAMS
sql:
CREATE TABLE "EQUATION_TEMPLATE_PARAMS" (
	"ID"	INTEGER NOT NULL,
	"PARAM_NAME"	TEXT(32) NOT NULL DEFAULT b,
	"PARAM_VALUE"	NUMERIC NOT NULL DEFAULT 1.0,
	"RELATED_ID"	INTEGER NOT NULL,
	PRIMARY KEY("ID")
)
